content.statement: The entity to which a person may furnish copies of process, pleadings, or papers for service on non-resident investment advisers, general partners, or managing agents.
content.trasformed: A Commission is by definition an entity to which a person may furnish copies of process, pleadings, or papers for service on non-resident investment advisers, general partners, or managing agents.

content.statement: The Secretary of the Commission (Secretary) will promptly forward a copy to each named party by registered or certified mail at that party's last address filed with the Commission.
content.trasformed: A Secretary of the Commission is by definition a role that involves promptly forwarding a copy to each named party by registered or certified mail at that party's last address filed with the Commission.

content.statement: The Secretary of the Commission who forwards documents to named parties.
content.trasformed: A Secretary of the Commission is by definition a Secretary who forwards documents to named parties.

content.statement: The legal authority or control of the United States over a place.
content.trasformed: A jurisdiction of the United States is by definition a legal authority or control over a place.

content.statement: The section that defines 'Principal office and place of business'.
content.trasformed: A 'Principal office and place of business' is by definition the main location where the executive officers of the company conduct their business activities.

content.statement: The publication where notice of the initiation of the proceeding will be published.
content.trasformed: A Federal Register is by definition a publication where notice of the initiation of the proceeding will be published.

content.statement: The body that initiates proceedings, issues orders, and may order hearings.
content.trasformed: A Commission is by definition a body that initiates proceedings, issues orders, and may order hearings.

content.statement: Refers to the Act under which the Commission operates and makes orders.
